title: Putty errors are indistinguishable from OK messages
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
If Putty message is fine, then no changes in mRemoteNG.
If Putty produces error, then please make it red font color.

## Current Behavior
In both cases the same grey font color.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Create a SSH key in PUTTYGEN and copy public key to SSH server on Linux server.
2. Connect to SSH server and if there is incorrect SSH key, Putty produces error. But errors in Putty are displayed in grey.

## Context
In our company SSH keys to authenti...

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: I am not sure but we cant control colors in putty it self, at least in this version we have, but potentialy we could think about that osibility if we switch to windows terminal perhaps...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
